question: ‘Mukhya Mantri Shahari Rojgar Guarantee Yojna’ is the initiative of which state, that guarantees employment for at least 120 days to urban-dwellers?
explanation:
The state government of Himachal Pradesh has decided to launch a programme named ‘Mukhya Mantri Shahari Rojgar Guarantee Yojna’, which aims to guarantee employment for at least 120 days to urban-dwellers.
The cabinet also announced that the people who would be employed will also be given training for upgrading their skills. As thousands of workers have now returned to Himachal Pradesh from various other states, their experience in multiple fields would be harnessed to provide employment.
